footer.subtitle: Pure honey, pure joy – nature’s gift for every day.

hero.title: Pure honey, pure joy – nature’s gift for every day.
hero.subtitle: Discover the finest, purest honey from around the world, delivered straight to your door.

whyChoose.title: Why Choose VitézMéz?
whyChoose.naturalText: Our honey is raw, unfiltered, and free from any additives.
whyChoose.sustainableText: We partner with beekeepers who prioritize bee health and environmental sustainability.
whyChoose.flavorsText: From Clover to Manuka, explore a world of unique and delicious tastes.

recipeSuggestions.title: Recipe Suggestions
recipeSuggestions.description: Choose a type of honey and let our AI chef inspire you with tasty, creative recipes.
recipeSuggestions.suggestionsTitle: Here are our suggestions for you:
recipeSuggestions.placeholderText: Fill out the form on the left to get started and discover your next favorite dish!

blog.title: The Hive Blog
blog.subtitle: Sweet stories, healthy recipes, and the latest buzz from the world of honey.

about.title: About Us
about.intro: The story of VitézMéz began more than three decades ago, when we started as a small family beekeeping business. Since then, we have been passionately working to bring nature’s purest treasures to every customer’s table.
about.history: In the beginning, we had only a few hives. Today, with hundreds of bee colonies, we ensure that we produce the highest quality honey possible. Behind every jar of honey lies hard work and dedication.
about.mission: Our mission is to offer natural, pure, and sustainably produced honey that preserves the true flavors and health benefits of nature.

contact.title: Get in Touch
contact.subtitle: Have a question or a comment? Drop us a line, we'd love to hear from you.
contact.messagePlaceholder: Tell us how we can help...
contact.emailUsText: Send us an email for any inquiry.
